casebody.data:
McHAM
v.
NORTH CAROLINA MUTUAL LIFE INS. No. 597P03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2005. Todd M. Peebles, Winston-Salem, John J. Korzen, Kernersville, for McHam. Charles T. Francis, Raleigh, for NC Mutual Life Ins. Co.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of December 2004 by Plaintiff for Admission Pro Hac Vice of Cynthia E. Young:

"Motion Dismissed as Moot by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of February 2005."
